title: King and the prince: Sepp Kuss finds GC mentor in Jonas Vingegaard: ‘I try to help him as much as possible’
content:
The American climber picked up useful lessons from Vingegaard and Roglič that he is applying to his historic Vuelta bid.

Read the full article at King and the prince: Sepp Kuss finds GC mentor in Jonas Vingegaard: ‘I try to help him as much as possible’ on Velo.
author: ahood
